lines.gurmukhi: koaU bycY giV giV ssqR DnK bwn koaU bycY giV giV ibibiD snwh jI
lines.transliteration_english: Kooo Baychai Garhi Garhi Sasatr Dhanakh Baana , Kooo Baychai Garhi Garhi Bibidhi Sanaah Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Someone manufactures bows and arrows used for killing while others fabricate armour coats and shields to defend against these weapons.

lines.gurmukhi: koaU bycY gors dugD dD GiRq inq koaU bycY bwrunI ibKm sm cwh jI
lines.transliteration_english: Kooo Baychai Goras Dougadh Dadh Ghrit Nita , Kooo Baychai Baarounee Bikham Sam Chaah Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Someone sells nourishing foods like milk, butter, curd etc. to make the body strong while others produce items like wine etc. that are harmful and destructive to the body.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy hI ibkwrI aupkwrI hY AswD swD ibiKAw AMmiRq bn dyKy Avgwh jI
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Hee Bikaaree Oupakaaree Hai Asaadh Saadha , Bikhiaa Anmrit Ban Daykhay Avagaah Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: So is a base and low person who spreads evil whereas an obedient Guru-oriented saintly person of the True Guru desires and endeavours to dispense good for all. Treat it like bathing in a sea of poison or jumping into a reservoir of nectar.

lines.gurmukhi: Awqmw Acyq pMCI Dwvq cqurkuMt jYsy eI ibrK bYTy cwKy Pl qwh jI ]391]
lines.transliteration_english: Aatamaa Achayt Panchhee Dhaavat Chaturakounta , Jaisay Ee Birakh Baitthay Chaakhay Dhal Taah Jee ?391?

Shabad OS B.translation: Like an innocent bird, a human mind wanders in all four directions. Whatever tree it sits on, it would get that fruit to eat. In the company of evil-doers, the mind will only pick up dross whereas one collects virtues from the company of Guru-conscious sa
